NomaiObject:
Clue to convey: Warp transmitters require a warp receiver (context: wait, the warp receiver isnt installed yet!)
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
FILIX: Friends, take note: I have installed this tractor beam to catch your fall, should anyone slip and fall.
2
1
PLUME: How brilliant, Filix! This <color=orange>Belaying Beam</color> should prove most useful, until we are able to devise better ways to protect ourselves from the black hole.
3
2
THATCH: Indeed. I imagine we will need to make liberal use of this lifeline, as we begin the arduous construction of our new settlement!
BH_H EX1 1
BH_H EX2 6
BH_H EX3 4
